verses.verse: But there also became fraudulent preachers among the ethnic group, as fraudulent teachers will also be among you, some who will quietly introduce sects of ruin, even denying the Owner who bought them, leading quick ruin onto themselves.
And many will follow from their ruining behaviors, because of whom, hurtful things will be said about the way of the truth.
And in a desire for more, they will travel among you with manipulating messages, to whom the judgment from a long time ago isn't idle, and their ruin isn't nodding off.
You see, if God did not go easy on angels that sinned, but turned them over to cords of gloom when He put them in the lowest part of hell (Tartarus), being kept for judgment,
and if He did not go easy on the original world, but guarded an eighth person, Noah, a public speaker for the right way, when He led a flood onto a world of godless people,
and if when cremating the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah, He found them guilty with a disaster, having put a demonstration out there for people who are going to be godless,
and if He saved Lot who did what is right, who was oppressed by the behavior of the noncompliant people in indulgent activity
(you see, by what was seen and what was heard, as the person who did what is right resided among them from day to day, with criminal actions he was torturing a soul that was right),
the Master knows to be saving godly people from troubles, but to be keeping people who do what is wrong tormented for a day of judgment,

especially the people traveling behind a physical body in a desire of desecration and ignoring government. Self-pleasuring, daring people, they do not tremble as they say hurtful things about magnificent things.
Where angels, who are greater in strength and ability, don't bring a hurtful judgment against them beside the Master,

these people (as natural irrational living beings having been born for capture and decomposition), saying hurtful things in ways that they are unaware of, will be entirely worsened in their deterioration,
who will retrieve the wrong way's pay, regarding the lavish things in a day as pleasure, they are stains and blemishes, being lavish in their frauds, partying together with you,
having eyes full of cheating on spouses and addicted to sin, enticing unestablished souls, having a heart that has been strenuously exercised with a desire for more, children of a curse.
Leaving the straight way down here, they were misled after following from the way of Balaam (the son of Beor), who loved the wrong way's pay.
But he had a reprimand of his own lawlessness. A voiceless workhorse that articulated in a person's voice hindered the wrong focus of the preacher.
These people are springs without water, clouds driven by a sudden burst, for whom the gloom of the darkness has been kept for the span of time.

You see, articulating exaggerated statements of futileness, they entice the people in indulgent activities in desires of the physical body who really are escaping away from the people who are messed up in a misleading lie,
promising them freedom, they themselves being slaves of the deterioration. You see, what someone has been defeated by, to this he has also been enslaved.

You see, if after escaping away from the desecrations of the world in a correct understanding of the Master and Rescuer Jesus, the Anointed King, but being entangled again to these things, they are defeated, the last things have become worse for them than the first things;
for it was better for them not to have correctly understood the road of the right way, than, after correctly understanding it, to turn back from the sacred demand given over to them.
The picture of the truthful analogy has transpired with them: "A dog that turned back to its own vomit and a pig that bathed itself into a rotation of muck."
